md3.md3view.visitor
Class MD3GLModelExportPlgVisitor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--md3.md3model.MD3ModelVisitor
        |
        +--md3.md3view.glmodel.MD3GLModelVisitor
              |
              +--md3.md3view.visitor.MD3GLModelExportPlgVisitor
public class MD3GLModelExportPlgVisitor
extends MD3GLModelVisitor

An MD3GLModel visitor that walks through an MD3GLModel structure and writes the vertex data of all meshes of the current frame of the encountered models to a specified output stream in PLG format. PLG is a format specific to Luc Van Deuren his 3D engine: OpenSpace.

Author:
Erwin Vervaet (klr8@fragland.net)
